episodes.title: The Dark Truth Behind the Children of God Cult
episodes.description:
What started as a so-called religious movement quickly spiraled into something much more sinister. The Children of God cult preyed on vulnerable people, disguising control and abuse as faith and love. For years, they operated in the shadows—but how did they grow so powerful? And what really happened behind closed doors? 👀

In this episode of T&E with the Tea, we’re breaking down the disturbing reality of this cult, its shocking practices, and where its members are today. You don’t want to miss this one!
